akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 875, 876. Repealed. June 25, 1948, ch. 646, § 39, 62 Stat. 992
Section 875, act Mar. 2, 1917, ch. 145, § 55, 39 Stat. 968, related to continuation of court’s jurisdiction.
Section 876, act Jan. 7, 1913, ch. 6, 37 Stat. 648, related to temporary judge.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Sept. 1, 1948, see section 38 of act June 25, 1948, set out as an Effective Date note preceding section 1 of Title 28, Judiciary and Judicial Procedure.
